A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Star Wars has a solid place in my heart as a connector to my grandmother who passed away a few years back. We went to see the Original Trilogy upon its release every opening morning. I skipped middle school classes to see Phantom Menace when it was released\, and have lived with the lore of the Skywalkers for most of my life. 

TFA was okay to me\, and I was willing to accept a change in the direction of these films\, however TLJ is a disgrace and puts to shame everything I ever loved about Star Wars\, good or bad. I would explain as to why\, but all of the myriad of reasons have been covered at great lengths. 

Disney has scammed me long enough and will not get a single cent of my hard earned money in the future. Rey\, Poe\, Finn\, Rose and Kylo can all go suck Mickeys shaft for all I care
